title: Prime 2-Acre Land for Sale on Kumasi-Tamale Road
description: This 2-acre (8-plot) parcel of land is strategically located along the Kumasi-Tamale road, just after the UDS main entrance. Its prime location makes it an excellent investment opportunity for commercial, residential, or industrial development.

title: Land for Sale in Tamale - Prime Location
